reason: VAGUE HECKE SYMMETRIZATION: The node invokes 'the Hecke symmetrization relation' without identifying which relation. Known Hecke symmetrizations give SUM identities (P*_λ = Σ F*_μ, P_λ = Σ f_μ). The RATIO identity F*_μ/P*_λ = f_μ/P_λ for each individual μ is enormously stronger and does NOT follow from any sum identity.
